publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2059.1 Margaret Mitchell: Violence Against Women—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2059) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, leave out from "affirms" to end and insert "acknowledges the significant funding that has gone into domestic abuse initiatives in the last four years; supports the Scottish Executive’s decision to set up an expert committee to support the development of a strategic approach to tackling this issue in future; welcomes the more recent work of the Executive in setting up the Violence Against Women Fund, and calls on it, in supporting Rape Crisis Scotland and the ten rape crisis centres throughout Scotland, to ensure that male victims of rape have access to these services, as part of its commitment to eradicating all forms of violence against all men, women and children in Scotland."
